entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:16 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: NNE 62 km/h gust 85 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 along exposed areas of the coast this morning. Wind becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 near noon then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 except minus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 this evening. Low minus 6 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with flurries or rain showers. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
